    • Method Detail

      • getSelectionScope

        public SelectionScope getSelectionScope()
        Specified by:
        getSelectionScope in interface Extractor<DocumentType extends Document>
        Returns:
        The scope of the current selection. It defines if nothing, the whole document or only a part of the document is selected.

      • extract

        public TypedCheckInformation<DocumentType> extract(AcrolinxFactory factory,
                                          ExtractionScope extractionScope,
                                          ClientSettings clientSettings,
                                          CheckCapabilities checkCapabilities)
        Description copied from interface: Extractor
        Extracts the text from the application document, by respecting the current configurations defined by these methods parameters.
        Specified by:
        extract in interface Extractor<DocumentType extends Document>
        Parameters:
        factory - The factory could be used for creating the CheckInformation via AcrolinxFactory.checkInformations().
        extractionScope - The scope of the extraction defines if the whole text should be extracted or only a selection.
        clientSettings - The ClientSettings used to perform this extraction. They are containing also the extension settings which are used for the segmentation and filtering. See: ClientSettings.getExtensionSettings(), FilterExtension.fromExtensionSettings(com.acrolinx.javasdk.gui.settings.extension.ExtensionSettings) and SegmentationExtension.fromExtensionSettings(com.acrolinx.javasdk.gui.settings.extension.ExtensionSettings)
        checkCapabilities - The CheckCapabilities defining the check time capabilities. They are defining how the text should be extracted.
        Returns:
        The new TypedCheckInformation containing the extracted document.

      • getDocumentType

        public DocumentTypeIdentifier getDocumentType()
        Specified by:
        getDocumentType in interface TagListProvider
        Returns:
        The DocumentTypeIdentifier is providing a unique identifier for all documents containing the same tags. This could be the document file type, the DTD in XML or the file name of the document.

        Specified by:

        Returns:
